summary: "Ed Wood" is a 1994 American film directed by Tim Burton. It tells the story of cult filmmaker Ed Wood, played by Johnny Depp, and his friendship with actor Bela Lugosi (Martin Landau). The movie focuses on Wood's life during his most famous films. Although it didn't make much money, "Ed Wood" received high praise for Depp and Landau's performances and won two Academy Awards. It's now seen as a cult classic.
title: Ed Wood (film)
